name: Space war (itch) (see brews  games)
description:
Will you truly be the best gunner in the fleet or will the ground troops have to survive the enemy?     find out in this retro 2d first-person space shooter !

computer  controllers :  

up (arrow up, w) 

down (arrow down, s)

left (arrow left, a)

right(arrow  right , d)

A (alt, z, j)

B (control, k, x) 

start (Enter)

select (shift)
